# How to Start a Free Trial of No-Code Mobile App Security

Last updated July 17, 2023 by Appdome

Appdome is a no-code mobile app security platform designed to add security features to Android and iOS Apps.  This KB discusses how you can start your 5-day free trial for no-code mobile app security.

Appdome’s no-code mobile app security platform offers mobile developers, DevSec and security professionals a convenient and reliable way to protect Android and iOS apps withour coding. When a user clicks “Build My App,” Appdome leverages a microservice architecture filled with 1000s of security plugins, and an adaptive code generation engine that matches the correct required plugins to the development environment, frameworks, and methods in each app.

Thank you for visiting and we hope you find this article useful.

## The Top 5 Benefits of a Free Trial of No-Code Mobile App Security

The top 5 benefits of an Appdome Free Trial are:

1. **No-Code** – Bring your app to Appdome, select the security you want to add and click “Build My App”. That’s it. No coding is required!
2. **Instant Proof of Concept (POC)** – Appdome is the only solution that comes with proof. Build, Test and Validate your mobile security use case in minutes.
3. **Instant Remediation** – No matter the mobile security vulnerabilities in the app, Appdome will instantly remediate them.
4. **No dependencies** – Developers don’t have to do anything to prepare their apps for Appdome. All you need is your compiled apk, aab, ipa or bitcode file.
5. **Any development framework** – Appdome works with any Android and iOS app, developed in any framework, including Swift, Objective C, C++, React Native, Maui, Xamarin, Cordova, and more.

## How to Start a 5-day Free Trial of No-Code Mobile App Security

After you [create an account](https://fusion.appdome.com) on [Appdome](https://www.appdome.com/dev-sec-blog/what-is-the-appdome-platform/), we will ask you a couple questions before you can start a self-guided, 5-day trial of the premium features in our no-code Mobile App Security solutions.

### Free Trial for Mobile App Security

This is a 5-day free trial of Appdome’s [all-in-one mobile app security suite](https://www.appdome.com/mobile-app-security/all-in-one-mobile-app-security/). To get started [create your Appdome account](https://fusion.appdome.com/signup). An Appdome representative will contact you to better understand your use case and give you an overview of the all-in-one mobile app security options on the platform.

### Free Trial for F5 Anti-Bot

This is a 5-day free trial of Appdome’s [F5 Anti-Bot](https://www.appdome.com/consumer-apps/mobile-threat-defense/f5-anti-bot/) solution. To get started [create your Appdome account](https://fusion.appdome.com/signup). An Appdome representative will contact you to better understand your use case and give you an overview of the anti-bot options on the platform. This solution also requires a license for F5 Advanced Web Application Firewall (Advanced WAF or AWAF). Please contact your F5 account manager to get the promo code.

### Free Trial for Secure SDK Delivery

This is a 5-day free trial of Appdome’s Secure SDK Delivery solutions. To get started [create your Appdome account](https://fusion.appdome.com/signup). An Appdome representative will contact you to better understand your use case and give you an overview of the different options on the platform, including [Microsoft Intune](https://www.appdome.com/enterprise-mobile-apps/uem-mam-sdks/microsoft-intune/), [Microsoft Identity](https://www.appdome.com/enterprise-mobile-apps/mobile-iam/microsoft-identity/), [VMware Workspace ONE](https://www.appdome.com/enterprise-mobile-apps/uem-mam-sdks/vmware-workspace-one/), [BlackBerry Dynamics](https://www.appdome.com/enterprise-mobile-apps/uem-mam-sdks/blackberry-dynamics/) and more.

## Guided Testing for the Free Trial Options for No-Code Mobile App Security

Guided Testing is available for up to a maximum of 5 days. Guided Tests are arranged by Appdome personnel, enabling users to experience all the benefits of the Appdome platform, services, and advanced features. Guided Tests include the assignment of a technical account manager who is knowledgeable about your specific mobile integration use case and a detailed testing plan.
